dmca.title: Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry complains of copying
dmca.body:
1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following pages: http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/agates.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/amazonite.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/amber.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/amethyst.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/aquamarine.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/charolte.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gernstones/chrysocolla.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/chrysoprase.htm
http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/citrine.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/garnet.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/gaspeite.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/jade.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/jasper.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/spectro.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/lapis.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/larimar.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/onyx.htm 
http://www.bernardine.com/birthstone/opal.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/pearl.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/perv-opal.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/rhodochrosite.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gernstones/rutilated-quartz.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gernstones/sapphire.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/sugilite.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/tanzanite.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/tigers-eye.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/topaz.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/turquoise.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/variscite.htm

2.	Search Query: 'Light opal is the most common type of opal found Infringing Web Page: http://www.heavenly-gifts.com/gemstone-beads.html

3.	Contact: [private]@bernardine.com.

4.	Contact information for infringing webpage: [private] [private]@sbcglobal.net

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry http://www.bernardine.com
